recommendations.title: Pride & Prejudice
recommendations.reason: A sweeping romance that feels cozy on cold evenings, with a runtime that allows you to settle in and enjoy the period atmosphere.

recommendations.title: The Holiday
recommendations.reason: A light‑hearted romantic comedy perfect for snuggling under a blanket while the weather stays chilly, with plenty of time to unwind.

recommendations.title: Love Actually
recommendations.reason: Multiple interwoven love stories give a warm feeling against a cold backdrop, and the generous runtime lets each tale breathe.

recommendations.title: Silver Linings Playbook
recommendations.reason: A relaxed, feel‑good drama that matches the quiet of a cold night, offering enough length to get fully absorbed in the characters.

recommendations.title: La La Land
recommendations.reason: A dreamy musical romance that feels especially soothing when it’s cold outside, with a runtime that lets the melody linger.
